title: Angela Richardson – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Angela Richardson, the Conservative MP for Guildford, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
“The best hope is for a highly disciplined, rational individual…….a rare find in British politics”
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

Sharing this important endorsement from William Hague again.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

Rishi Sunak is the right candidate if the national interest comes before every other consideration. As it should.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
